name: copilot-lineage-deriver
description: Generate lineage CSV files from various file types using Copilot agent mode

copilotLineageDeriver.inputFolder.description: Relative path to the folder containing mapping subfolders with files

copilotLineageDeriver.outputFolder.description: Relative path for the output CSV files

copilotLineageDeriver.delayBetweenReques.description: Delay between batch processing requests in milliseconds

copilotLineageDeriver.batchSize.description: Number of files to process in each batch (set to 1 for sequential processing)

copilotLineageDeriver.enableBatchProcess.description: Enable batch processing for improved performance with large file volumes

copilotLineageDeriver.fileTypeInstructio.description: Mapping of file extensions to instruction files

copilotLineageDeriver.defaultInstruction.description: Default instruction file to use when no specific mapping exists

chatParticipants.name: Extract Lineage
chatParticipants.description: Extract lineage from files using Copilot

commands.name: extract-all
commands.description: Extract lineage from all files in the configured input folder

commands.name: extract-folder
commands.description: Extract lineage from files in a specific folder
